TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BoundPropertyEntry extends System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry

summary.span: 表示数据绑定到表达式的控件属性。

span.span: Represents a control property that is data-bound to an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析页时，页分析器将保留有关表达式及其绑定到对象的属性的信息 。When a page is parsed, the page parser retains information about an expression and the property it is bound to in a object.
